pros: You could not wish for a nicer group of people to work with.  They work hard and can get stressed at times but care and support each other in a way I have never experienced before in 27 years of healthcare.  They are an absolute credit to Addaction.  I joined the company knowing very little about drug and alcohol recovery and have learnt so much from these wonderful people.  I am sadly leaving after 10 months not because I am unhappy but to take a more secure job.  If circumstances were different I would return to Addaction Hereford in a heartbeat.
cons: The pay and pension is not comparable to an equivalent post in the NHS.  The workload is high and a lot of time is spent typing into the Nebula computer programme which is cumbersome and temperamental.

cons: What we do is tough and can take it’s toll.
